Official ESW Wrestling School Buffalo Wrestling Academy

Buffalo Wrestling Academy is a fully equipped training facility, dedicated to training professional wrestlers, referees, and managers of all experience levels. Whether you’re new to the game, or have years of experience, BWA is the place for you. Covering aspects such as ring psychology, character development, social media presence, etiquette, networking, and so much more. We are committed to helping you reach your success and achieve your goals. Join us today!

Head Trainer Vince Valor

Beginning his wrestling journey over 15 years ago, Vince Valor has become established as a staple on the Western New York wrestling scene. Trained by the late JT Playa/Tiberious King at the NEO Wrestling Dojo in Niagara Falls, Canada. Valor instills in his students a strong work ethic, and puts an emphasis on earning opportunities through hard work and dedication. Valor is committed to helping his students achieve their own success.

Trainer Robby Vegas

“Rockstar” Robby Vegas has been in the wrestling business close to a decade and half and has shared the ring across 5 states and Canada with superstars such as Fandango, Lio Rush, Warlord, Barbarian, Tommy Dreamer, Super Crazy, and Tatanka. With multiple appearances on WWE programming he’s also taken seminars from the likes of Al Snow, and Matt Cross over the course of his career. Winning multiple championships and working for multiple companies and has been a trainer at BWA since the doors opened.
